entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING ENDED, Goderich

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 12:49 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
